entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is described as a Durmstrang student sitting at the Slytherin table. He appears wary and frightened.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as welcoming guests back to Hogwarts and emphasizing the importance of unity in the face of Voldemort's return.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as having a gift for spreading discord and enmity.

entities.name: durmstrang students
entities.description: The Durmstrang students are described as being welcomed back to Hogwarts by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Krum looks wary and frightened at Dumbledore.
Dumbledore welcomes the Durmstrang students back to Hogwarts.
Voldemort's return affects Krum, making him wary and frightened.
